articles.description: Live BBC Radio Wales Extra commentary and text coverage as Wales kick off their WXV1 campaign against Canada in New Zealand.
articles.title: WXV1 - HT: Canada 21-17 Wales - Evans interception gives Wales hope

articles.description: Will Jordan scores an impressive hat-trick as seven-try New Zealand crush Argentina at Stade de France to reach a record fifth Rugby World Cup final.
articles.title: All Blacks cruise past Argentina to reach final

articles.description: Former England international Paul Grayson and ex-Springbok Bobby Skinstad plot a path to victory for underdogs England in Saturday's World Cup semi-final.
articles.title: How England can upset odds and beat South Africa

articles.description: Ferrari's Charles Leclerc takes pole position in a tight qualifying session in the United States Grand Prix, with Max Verstappen down in sixth on the grid.
articles.title: Leclerc takes 'surprise' US GP pole position

articles.description: England's white-ball team returns to the scene of a memorable victory against South Africa when the two teams meet again on Saturday.
articles.title: England hope Mumbai return can ignite campaign

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says his excellent record in the Merseyside derby will count for nothing on Saturday.
articles.title: Klopp's 'uncomfortable' reminder of derby record

articles.description: Watch highlights as New Zealand thrash Argentina 44-6 to reach their record fifth Rugby World Cup final.
articles.title: New Zealand thrash Argentina to reach record fifth World Cup final

articles.description: Former British number one Emma Raducanu says she is constantly asking questions and challenging her coaches.
articles.title: Coaches can't keep up with my questions - Raducanu

articles.description: David Warner's superb 163 inspires Australia to a 62-run victory over Pakistan as they breathe life into their World Cup campaign.
articles.title: Warner ton inspires Australia victory over Pakistan

articles.description: BBC Sport analyses why so many matches at the Cricket World Cup have been poorly attended so far.
articles.title: Why do crowds look so low at Cricket World Cup?
